alert.note: Alert for La Paz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 22 at 6:15PM MST until September 22 at 10:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of west central Arizona, including northeast La Paz County. * WHEN...Until 845 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Running washes will create a hazard for some unbridged road crossings. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 615 PM MST, Rainfall in the area has ended. However, ongoing runoff, including from storms that were over Yavapai County, is expected to continue. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Bullard Wash, Date Creek, Santa Maria River, and smaller washes feeding into Centennial Wash and Cunningham Wash. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Alamo State Park, Old Alamo Road, Wickenburg Road, Date Creek Road, and Old Ranch Road. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
